author: amar3tt0
name: Light Dark Balance
description:
Light Dark balance Theme

includes:

-gnome-shell theme

-some ics icons on the shell

-gtk3, gtk2

-the hope metacity

-emerald support

-xfce support

To instal the theme you have to extract the folder to ~/.themes or as root to /usr/share/themes

to see more things of the gnome shell and others:


http://amar3tt0.deviantart.com/art/Light-Dark-Balance-304922081
